summary: This is an email chain from August 16, 2019, discussing the sharing of an 'After Action' report with Executive staff. The report is noted as not yet reviewed and approved by the Director, and the sender mentions there are no hard copies available.

persons.name: MDC Brookl
persons.context: Addressed as 'Boss' in the email chain and asked if it's okay to share the After Action report with Executive staff.

keyFacts: An 'After Action' report exists but had not been reviewed and approved by the Director as of August 16, 2019.
There were no hard copies of the report available at the time of the email.
The email discusses whether it is permissible to share the report with the Executive staff.
